description: PIMS 715 CC: FSP "Croatia - Removing Barriers to Improving Energy Efficiency of the Residental and Service Sectors"

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description:
1.1 Enhanced capacity of the regional authorities to promote energy efficiency
2.1 Increased public awareness of the available energy efficient technologies and measures and their benefits to the consumers
2.2 A successfully conducted pilot marketing campaign to promote EE improvements projects.
2.3 Replication of similar projects for other regions and technologies.
3.1 Increased awareness of the owners of the public and commercial buildings on the available energy efficient technologies and measures.
3.2 Enhanced capacity of the local stakeholders to initiate and support the development and implementation of energy efficiency measures in the service sector
3.3 A pipeline of “bankable” energy efficiency proposals
3.4 A partial guarantee fund to leverage financing for the energy efficiency investments
4.1 A system for monitoring the GHG emission reductions of the proposed pilot/demonstration projects
4.2 Project results, experiences and lessons learnt documented and disseminated at the national and regional level.
subproject.title: PIMS 715 CC FSP EE

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
1.1 Enhanced capacity of the regional authorities to promote energy efficiency
2.1 Increased public awareness of the available energy efficient technologies and measures and their benefits to the consumers
2.2 A successfully conducted pilot marketing campaign to promote EE improvements projects.

3.2 Enhanced capacity of the local stakeholders to initiate and support the development and implementation of energy efficiency measures in the service sector

subproject.title: PIMS 715 CC FSP EE

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The EE Project aims at removing barriers for the implementation of economically feasible, energy efficient technologies and measures in residential and public sectors in Croatia, with the final goal to reduce energy consumption and the associated greenhouse gases, and rising public awareness about efficient use of energy. Important role of the Project is directed to strenghtening public service sector capacities (at cities, counties and central-government level) to systematically manage energy consumption in buildings, to identify and implement energy efficiency measures with the final result in reduced costs for energy, energy consumption and GHG emissions.
subproject.title: EE PROJECT

title: Energy Efficiency in Public and Residential Buildings
